name: THE SHORT ENDLESS Roller GAME
description:
Jump! Double Jump!

Aviod the Spikes!

Collect the Iron Gems!!!!

Can you master the controls of this little Roller?

Get Ready to be Frustrated!!!

_____________________________________________________

THE WINDOWS VERSION WILL MAKE YOU CURSE EVERY MINUTE OF THE GAME AND THEN YOU WILL WANT TO RUN INTO A WALL... HEAD FIRST!!!!

FRUSTRATINGLY AWESOME!!!!!!

_____________________________________________________
